abstract: “Survivor: Micronesia” buoyed CBS’s otherwise repeat heavy line-up on Thursday, as the network earned the most viewers even as ABC fared better among adults 18 to 49.
snippet: “Survivor: Micronesia” buoyed CBS’s otherwise repeat heavy line-up on Thursday, as the network earned the most viewers even as ABC fared better among adults 18 to 49.
lead_paragraph: “Survivor: Micronesia” buoyed CBS’s otherwise repeat heavy line-up on Thursday, as the network earned the most viewers even as ABC fared better among adults 18 to 49. ABC got a boost from the night’s top rated show, “Lost,” which led the 9 p.m. hour with 13.6 million viewers according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: Ratings: CBS’s Formula? Survive, Repeat, Rinse
